title: Profile Card Component
description:
Create a reusable profile card component using view composition.

## Requirements

1. Create a `ProfileCard` view that accepts:
   - `name: String`
   - `title: String`
   - `imageName: String` (SF Symbol name)

2. The card should display:
   - A circular image at the top
   - The name in headline font
   - The title in subheadline font with secondary color
   - All content centered in a VStack

3. Apply card styling:
   - White background
   - Rounded corners (12pt)
   - Subtle shadow
   - Padding inside the card

4. Create a preview showing multiple ProfileCards

## Expected Output

A polished card component that can be reused with different data.
